12241367-a8b7-49b4-b86e-2236901ba50c.name: Network Intrusion Prevention
12241367-a8b7-49b4-b86e-2236901ba50c.description: Use intrusion detection signatures to block traffic at network boundaries.

15437c6d-b998-4a36-be41-4ace3d54d266.name: Vulnerability Scanning
15437c6d-b998-4a36-be41-4ace3d54d266.description: Vulnerability scanning is used to find potentially exploitable software vulnerabilities to remediate them.

1dcaeb21-9348-42ea-950a-f842aaf1ae1f.name: Limit Access to Resource Over Network
1dcaeb21-9348-42ea-950a-f842aaf1ae1f.description: Prevent access to file shares, remote access to systems, unnecessary services. Mechanisms to limit access may include use of network concentrators, RDP gateways, etc.

20a2baeb-98c2-4901-bad7-dc62d0a03dea.name: Remote Data Storage
20a2baeb-98c2-4901-bad7-dc62d0a03dea.description: Use remote security log and sensitive file storage where access can be controlled better to prevent exposure of intrusion detection log data or sensitive information.

20f6a9df-37c4-4e20-9e47-025983b1b39d.name: Filter Network Traffic
20f6a9df-37c4-4e20-9e47-025983b1b39d.description: Use network appliances to filter ingress or egress traffic and perform protocol-based filtering. Configure software on endpoints to filter network traffic.

21da4fd4-27ad-4e9c-b93d-0b9b14d02c96.name: Restrict Web-Based Content
21da4fd4-27ad-4e9c-b93d-0b9b14d02c96.description: Restrict use of certain websites, block downloads/attachments, block Javascript, restrict browser extensions, etc.

23843cff-f7b9-4659-a7b7-713ef347f547.name: Limit Software Installation
23843cff-f7b9-4659-a7b7-713ef347f547.description: Block users or groups from installing unapproved software.

25dc1ce8-eb55-4333-ae30-a7cb4f5894a1.name: Application Developer Guidance
25dc1ce8-eb55-4333-ae30-a7cb4f5894a1.description: This mitigation describes any guidance or training given to developers of applications to avoid introducing security weaknesses that an adversary may be able to take advantage of.

2995bc22-2851-4345-ad19-4e7e295be264.name: Limit Hardware Installation
2995bc22-2851-4345-ad19-4e7e295be264.description: Block users or groups from installing or using unapproved hardware on systems, including USB devices.

2a4f6c11-a4a7-4cb9-b0ef-6ae1bb3a718a.name: User Training
2a4f6c11-a4a7-4cb9-b0ef-6ae1bb3a718a.description: Train users to be aware of access or manipulation attempts by an adversary to reduce the risk of successful spearphishing, social engineering, and other techniques that involve user interaction.

2c2ad92a-d710-41ab-a996-1db143bb4808.name: User Account Control
2c2ad92a-d710-41ab-a996-1db143bb4808.description: Configure Windows User Account Control to mitigate risk of adversaries obtaining elevated process access.

2f316f6c-ae42-44fe-adf8-150989e0f6d3.name: Operating System Configuration
2f316f6c-ae42-44fe-adf8-150989e0f6d3.description: Make configuration changes related to the operating system or a common feature of the operating system that result in system hardening against techniques.

3efe43d1-6f3f-4fcb-ab39-4a730971f70b.name: Data Backup
3efe43d1-6f3f-4fcb-ab39-4a730971f70b.description: Take and store data backups from end user systems and critical servers. Ensure backup and storage systems are hardened and kept separate from the corporate network to prevent compromise.

47e0e9fe-96ce-4f65-8bb1-8be1feacb5db.name: Execution Prevention
47e0e9fe-96ce-4f65-8bb1-8be1feacb5db.description: Block execution of code on a system through application control, and/or script blocking.

49c06d54-9002-491d-9147-8efb537fbd26.name: Credential Access Protection
49c06d54-9002-491d-9147-8efb537fbd26.description: Use capabilities to prevent successful credential access by adversaries; including blocking forms of credential dumping.

590777b3-b475-4c7c-aaf8-f4a73b140312.name: Code Signing
590777b3-b475-4c7c-aaf8-f4a73b140312.description: Enforce binary and application integrity with digital signature verification to prevent untrusted code from executing.

609191bf-7d06-40e4-b1f8-9e11eb3ff8a6.name: Environment Variable Permissions
609191bf-7d06-40e4-b1f8-9e11eb3ff8a6.description: Prevent modification of environment variables by unauthorized users and groups.

72dade3e-1cba-4182-b3b3-a77ca52f02a1.name: Privileged Process Integrity
72dade3e-1cba-4182-b3b3-a77ca52f02a1.description: Protect processes with high privileges that can be used to interact with critical system components through use of protected process light, anti-process injection defenses, or other process integrity enforcement measures.

787fb64d-c87b-4ee5-a341-0ef17ec4c15c.name: Do Not Mitigate
787fb64d-c87b-4ee5-a341-0ef17ec4c15c.description: This category is to associate techniques that mitigation might increase risk of compromise and therefore mitigation is not recommended.

78bb71be-92b4-46de-acd6-5f998fedf1cc.name: Pre-compromise
78bb71be-92b4-46de-acd6-5f998fedf1cc.description: This category is used for any applicable mitigation activities that apply to techniques occurring before an adversary gains Initial Access, such as Reconnaissance and Resource Development techniques.

7bb5fae9-53ad-4424-866b-f0ea2a8b731d.name: SSL/TLS Inspection
7bb5fae9-53ad-4424-866b-f0ea2a8b731d.description: Break and inspect SSL/TLS sessions to look at encrypted web traffic for adversary activity.

7da0387c-ba92-4553-b291-b636ee42b2eb.name: Boot Integrity
7da0387c-ba92-4553-b291-b636ee42b2eb.description: Use secure methods to boot a system and verify the integrity of the operating system and loading mechanisms.

86598de0-b347-4928-9eb0-0acbfc21908c.name: Network Segmentation
86598de0-b347-4928-9eb0-0acbfc21908c.description: Architect sections of the network to isolate critical systems, functions, or resources. Use physical and logical segmentation to prevent access to potentially sensitive systems and information. Use a DMZ to contain any internet-facing services that should not be exposed from the internal network. Configure separate virtual private cloud (VPC) instances to isolate critical cloud systems.

874c0166-e407-45c2-a1d9-e4e3a6570fd8.name: Threat Intelligence Program
874c0166-e407-45c2-a1d9-e4e3a6570fd8.description: A threat intelligence program helps an organization generate their own threat intelligence information and track trends to inform defensive priorities to mitigate risk.

90c218c3-fbf8-4830-98a7-e8cfb7eaa485.name: Password Policies
90c218c3-fbf8-4830-98a7-e8cfb7eaa485.description: Set and enforce secure password policies for accounts.

90f39ee1-d5a3-4aaa-9f28-3b42815b0d46.name: Behavior Prevention on Endpoint
90f39ee1-d5a3-4aaa-9f28-3b42815b0d46.description: Use capabilities to prevent suspicious behavior patterns from occurring on endpoint systems. This could include suspicious process, file, API call, etc. behavior.

93e7968a-9074-4eac-8ae9-9f5200ec3317.name: User Account Management
93e7968a-9074-4eac-8ae9-9f5200ec3317.description: Manage the creation, modification, use, and permissions associated to user accounts.

987988f0-cf86-4680-a875-2f6456ab2448.name: Restrict File and Directory Permissions
987988f0-cf86-4680-a875-2f6456ab2448.description: Restrict access by setting directory and file permissions that are not specific to users or privileged accounts.

9bb9e696-bff8-4ae1-9454-961fc7d91d5f.name: Privileged Account Management
9bb9e696-bff8-4ae1-9454-961fc7d91d5f.description: Manage the creation, modification, use, and permissions associated to privileged accounts, including SYSTEM and root.

a2c36a5d-4058-475e-8e77-fff75e50d3b9.name: Restrict Registry Permissions
a2c36a5d-4058-475e-8e77-fff75e50d3b9.description: Restrict the ability to modify certain hives or keys in the Windows Registry.

a6a47a06-08fc-4ec4-bdc3-20373375ebb9.name: Antivirus/Antimalware
a6a47a06-08fc-4ec4-bdc3-20373375ebb9.description: Use signatures or heuristics to detect malicious software.

b045d015-6bed-4490-bd38-56b41ece59a0.name: Multi-factor Authentication
b045d015-6bed-4490-bd38-56b41ece59a0.description: Use two or more pieces of evidence to authenticate to a system; such as username and password in addition to a token from a physical smart card or token generator.

b5dbb4c5-b0b1-40b1-80b6-e9e84ab90067.name: Software Configuration
b5dbb4c5-b0b1-40b1-80b6-e9e84ab90067.description: Implement configuration changes to software (other than the operating system) to mitigate security risks associated to how the software operates.

b9f0c069-abbe-4a07-a245-2481219a1463.name: Application Isolation and Sandboxing
b9f0c069-abbe-4a07-a245-2481219a1463.description: Restrict execution of code to a virtual environment on or in transit to an endpoint system.

cc2399fd-3cd3-4319-8d0a-fbd6420cdaf8.name: Audit
cc2399fd-3cd3-4319-8d0a-fbd6420cdaf8.description: Perform audits or scans of systems, permissions, insecure software, insecure configurations, etc. to identify potential weaknesses.

d2a24649-9694-4c97-9c62-ce7b270bf6a3.name: Exploit Protection
d2a24649-9694-4c97-9c62-ce7b270bf6a3.description: Use capabilities to detect and block conditions that may lead to or be indicative of a software exploit occurring.

e3388c78-2a8d-47c2-8422-c1398b324462.name: Active Directory Configuration
e3388c78-2a8d-47c2-8422-c1398b324462.description: Configure Active Directory to prevent use of certain techniques; use SID Filtering, etc.

e5d930e9-775a-40ad-9bdb-b941d8dfe86b.name: Update Software
e5d930e9-775a-40ad-9bdb-b941d8dfe86b.description: Perform regular software updates to mitigate exploitation risk.

e8242a33-481c-4891-af63-4cf3e4cf6aff.name: Restrict Library Loading
e8242a33-481c-4891-af63-4cf3e4cf6aff.description: Prevent abuse of library loading mechanisms in the operating system and software to load untrusted code by configuring appropriate library loading mechanisms and investigating potential vulnerable software.

eb88d97c-32f1-40be-80f0-d61a4b0b4b31.name: Disable or Remove Feature or Program
eb88d97c-32f1-40be-80f0-d61a4b0b4b31.description: Remove or deny access to unnecessary and potentially vulnerable software to prevent abuse by adversaries.

f9f9e6ef-bc0a-41ad-ba11-0924e5e84c4c.name: Account Use Policies
f9f9e6ef-bc0a-41ad-ba11-0924e5e84c4c.description: Configure features related to account use like login attempt lockouts, specific login times, etc.

feff9142-e8c2-46f4-842b-bd6fb3d41157.name: Encrypt Sensitive Information
feff9142-e8c2-46f4-842b-bd6fb3d41157.description: Protect sensitive information with strong encryption.
